author: Will Bedingfield, WIRED UK
title: Coronavirus News Fatigue Is Officially Setting In
description: News fatigue isn't new. But it could indicate problematic changes in our behavior with respect to the pandemic.
content:
When confronted with a calamity that demands we stay home the majority of the time, its only natural that many of us have resorted to reading the news. 
This story originally appeared on WIRED UK.
Throughout March, we watched and surfed ceaselessly. The Gua… [+3689 chars]
